entry.title: HunterPie - An in-depth overview
entry.summary: If you enjoy HunterPie and want to support its development, consider supporting on Patreon! HunterPie is an overlay for Monster Hunter games, it displays useful in-game information that are not visible to the player such as monster health, damage done, time left on your buffs and debuffs and some weapon-specific data.
